oneOf.description: The ID of the entry. The value is a placeholder for new entries.

id.description: The ID of the entry. Usually, this is a number (string or number) this is the post ID of the new entry submission.

name.description: The short, descriptive name of the entry.

description.description: The description of the entry. that will also be understood by somebody not familiar with the topic. Usually, the first sentence on Wikipedia is a good example.

links.description: The links related to the entry.

subreddit.description: Subreddits that's either most relevant to the topic, or that was responsible for creating the artwork, excluding the r/.

items.description: A subreddit that's either most relevant to the topic, or that was responsible for creating the artwork.

website.description: URL to websites related to the entry, including the http/https protocol. If you're describing a project, the project's main website would be suitable here.

items.description: The URL to a website related to the entry.

discord.description: Invite codes of Discord servers related to the entry (excluding discord.gg/)

items.description: The invite code of a Discord server related to the entry.

wiki.description: Wiki pages related to the entry.

items.description: The title of the wiki page related to the entry.
